name: Recibo de Condominio
query:
select
tcu.territory
,th.name  as housing
,tcu.name as customer
,tcu.dni as dni
, tcce.posting_date as date_process
,tcce.name as gastos
,tsi.name as invoice
,tsii.description
,tsi.grand_total as total_invoiced
,tsi.outstanding_amount as outstanding_amount_invoice
,(select tce.exchange_rate from `tabCurrency Exchange` tce where tce.from_currency='USD' and tce.to_currency = 'VES' and tce.date <=tcce.posting_date limit 1  ) as rate
,(
	select sum(tsi1.outstanding_amount) as outstanding_amount
		from `tabSales Invoice` tsi1
		left join tabHousing th1 on tsi1.customer = th1.owner_customer
		join tabCustomer tcu1 on tsi1.customer= tcu1.name
		where tsi1.docstatus=1 

		and tsi1.outstanding_amount > 0 
		and (tsi1.customer =  tcu.name)
		and tsi1.status in ('Credit Note Issued','Submitted','Partly Paid','Unpaid','Unpaid and Discounted','Partly Paid and Discounted','Overdue and Discounted','Overdue')
		and tsi1.posting_date < tcce.posting_date
		and (th1.housing = th.housing)
		and (tcu1.territory =  tcu.territory)
		) as sum_outstanding_amount_preview
		
,(
	select sum(tsi1.outstanding_amount) as outstanding_amount
		from `tabSales Invoice` tsi1
		left join tabHousing th1 on tsi1.customer = th1.owner_customer
		join tabCustomer tcu1 on tsi1.customer= tcu1.name
		where tsi1.docstatus=1 

		and tsi1.outstanding_amount > 0 
		and (tsi1.customer =  tcu.name)
		and tsi1.status in ('Credit Note Issued','Submitted','Partly Paid','Unpaid','Unpaid and Discounted','Partly Paid and Discounted','Overdue and Discounted','Overdue')
		and (th1.housing =  th.housing)
		and tsi1.posting_date <= tcce.posting_date
		and (tcu1.territory =  tcu.territory)
		) as sum_outstanding_amount_total
		
,(
	select sum(tsi1.outstanding_amount) as outstanding_amount
		from `tabSales Invoice` tsi1
		left join tabHousing th1 on tsi1.customer = th1.owner_customer
		join tabCustomer tcu1 on tsi1.customer= tcu1.name
		where tsi1.docstatus=1 

		and tsi1.outstanding_amount > 0 
		and (tsi1.customer = tcu.name)
		and tsi1.status in ('Credit Note Issued','Submitted','Partly Paid','Unpaid','Unpaid and Discounted','Partly Paid and Discounted','Overdue and Discounted','Overdue')
		and (th1.housing =  th.housing)
		and tsi1.posting_date = tcce.posting_date
		and (tcu1.territory =  tcu.territory)
		) as sum_outstanding_amount_current

,(
    select sum(tsi1.grand_total) as grand_total
    from `tabSales Invoice` tsi1
        left join tabHousing th1 on tsi1.customer = th1.owner_customer
		join tabCustomer tcu1 on tsi1.customer= tcu1.name
		where tsi1.docstatus=1 
		and tcce.name = tsi1.gc_condo
		and (tsi1.customer = tcu.name)
		and (th1.housing =  th.housing)
		and (tcu1.territory =  tcu.territory)
)as sum_total_invoice		

from tabCondominium tc
join `tabCondominium Common Expenses` tcce on tc.name = tcce.condominium
left join `tabCondominium Common Expenses Detail` tcced on tcce.name = tcced.parent
join `tabSales Invoice` tsi on tcce.name = tsi.gc_condo
join `tabSales Invoice Item` tsii on tsi.name = tsii.parent
join tabCustomer tcu on tsi.customer= tcu.name
join tabHousing th on tcu.name = th.owner_customer
where 	tsi.docstatus=1 
		and (tsi.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) 
		and (tsi.customer =  %(customer)s or %(customer)s='')  
		and (tcu.territory =  %(territory)s or %(territory)s='')
		and (th.housing =  %(housing)s or %(housing)s='')
		and (tcce.name  = %(condominium)s or %(condominium)s='')
group by 6,7
order by 1,2,3,4,5,6,7
